verses.verse: Jude, <WG2455> the servant<WG1401> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG1161> brother<WG80> of James,<WG2385> to them that are sanctified<WG37> by<WG1722> God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> preserved<WG5083> in Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and called.<WG2822>
Mercy <WG1656> unto you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace,<WG1515> and<WG2532> love,<WG26> be multiplied.<WG4129>

Beloved, <WG27> when I gave<WG4160> all<WG3956> diligence<WG4710> to write<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> common<WG2839> salvation,<WG4991> it was needful<WG2192> <WG318> for me to write<WG1125> unto you,<WG5213> and exhort<WG3870> you that ye should earnestly contend for<WG1864> the<WG3588> faith<WG4102> which was once<WG530> delivered<WG3860> unto the<WG3588> saints.<WG40>

For <WG1063> there are certain<WG5100> men<WG444> crept in unawares,<WG3921> who were before of old ordained<WG4270> <WG3819> to<WG1519> this<WG5124> condemnation,<WG2917> ungodly men,<WG765> turning<WG3346> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> God<WG2316> into<WG1519> lasciviousness,<WG766> and<WG2532> denying<WG720> the<WG3588> only<WG3441> Lord<WG1203> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

I <WG1161> will<WG1014> therefore put you in remembrance,<WG5279> <WG5209> though ye<WG5209> once<WG530> knew<WG1492> this,<WG5124> how that<WG3754> the<WG3588> Lord,<WG2962> having saved<WG4982> the people<WG2992> out of<WG1537> the land<WG1093> of Egypt,<WG125> afterward<WG1208> destroyed<WG622> them that believed<WG4100> not.<WG3361>

And <WG5037> the angels<WG32> which kept<WG5083> not<WG3361> their<WG1438> first estate,<WG746> but<WG235> left<WG620> their own<WG2398> habitation,<WG3613> he hath reserved<WG5083> in everlasting<WG126> chains<WG1199> under<WG5259> darkness<WG2217> unto<WG1519> the judgment<WG2920> of the great<WG3173> day.<WG2250>

Even as<WG5613> Sodom<WG4670> and<WG2532> Gomorrah,<WG1116> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> cities<WG4172> about<WG4012> them<WG846> in like manner,<WG3664> <WG5158> giving themselves over to fornication,<WG1608> and<WG2532> going<WG565> after<WG3694> strange<WG2087> flesh,<WG4561> are set forth<WG4295> for an example,<WG1164> suffering<WG5254> the vengeance<WG1349> of eternal<WG166> fire.<WG4442>
Likewise <WG3668> also<WG2532> these<WG3778> filthy dreamers<WG1797> defile<WG3392> the flesh,<WG4561> <WG3303> despise<WG114> dominion,<WG2963> and<WG1161> speak evil of<WG987> dignities.<WG1391>

Yet <WG1161> Michael<WG3413> the<WG3588> archangel,<WG743> when<WG3753> contending<WG1252> with the<WG3588> devil<WG1228> he disputed<WG1256> about<WG4012> the<WG3588> body<WG4983> of Moses,<WG3475> durst<WG5111> not<WG3756> bring against<WG2018> him a railing<WG988> accusation,<WG2920> but<WG235> said,<WG2036> The Lord<WG2962> rebuke<WG2008> thee.<WG4671>

But <WG1161> these<WG3778> speak evil of<WG987> those things<WG3745> which they<WG3303> know<WG1492> not:<WG3756> but<WG1161> what<WG3745> they know<WG1987> naturally,<WG5447> as<WG5613> brute<WG249> beasts,<WG2226> in<WG1722> those things<WG5125> they corrupt themselves.<WG5351>

Woe <WG3759> unto them!<WG846> for<WG3754> they have gone<WG4198> in the<WG3588> way<WG3598> of Cain,<WG2535> and<WG2532> ran greedily after<WG1632> the<WG3588> error<WG4106> of Balaam<WG903> for reward,<WG3408> and<WG2532> perished<WG622> in the<WG3588> gainsaying<WG485> of Korah.<WG2879>

These <WG3778> are<WG1526> spots<WG4694> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> feasts of charity,<WG26> when they feast with<WG4910> you,<WG5213> feeding<WG4165> themselves<WG1438> without fear:<WG870> clouds<WG3507> they are without water,<WG504> carried about<WG4064> of<WG5259> winds;<WG417> trees<WG1186> whose fruit withereth,<WG5352> without fruit,<WG175> twice<WG1364> dead,<WG599> plucked up by the roots;<WG1610>

Raging <WG66> waves<WG2949> of the sea,<WG2281> foaming out<WG1890> their own<WG1438> shame;<WG152> wandering<WG4107> stars,<WG792> to whom<WG3739> is reserved<WG5083> the<WG3588> blackness<WG2217> of darkness<WG4655> forever.<WG1519> <WG165>

And <WG1161> Enoch<WG1802> also,<WG2532> the seventh<WG1442> from<WG575> Adam,<WG76> prophesied<WG4395> of these,<WG5125> saying,<WG3004> Behold,<WG2400> the Lord<WG2962> cometh<WG2064> with<WG1722> ten thousands<WG3461> of his<WG848> saints,<WG40>

To execute<WG4160> judgment<WG2920> upon<WG2596> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> to convince<WG1827> all<WG3956> that are ungodly<WG765> among them<WG846> of<WG4012> all<WG3956> their<WG848> ungodly<WG763> deeds<WG2041> which<WG3739> they have ungodly committed,<WG764> and<WG2532> of<WG4012> all<WG3956> their hard<WG4642> speeches which<WG3739> ungodly<WG765> sinners<WG268> have spoken<WG2980> against<WG2596> him.<WG846>

These <WG3778> are<WG1526> murmurers,<WG1113> complainers,<WG3202> walking<WG4198> after<WG2596> their own<WG848> lusts;<WG1939> and<WG2532> their<WG848> mouth<WG4750> speaketh<WG2980> great swelling<WG5246> words, having men's persons in admiration<WG2296> <WG4383> because of<WG5484> advantage.<WG5622>

But, <WG1161> beloved,<WG27> remember<WG3415> ye<WG5210> the<WG3588> words<WG4487> which were spoken before<WG4280> of<WG5259> the<WG3588> apostles<WG652> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ;<WG5547>

How that<WG3754> they told<WG3004> you<WG5213> there should<WG3754> be<WG2071> mockers<WG1703> in<WG1722> the last<WG2078> time,<WG5550> who should walk<WG4198> after<WG2596> their own<WG1438> ungodly<WG763> lusts.<WG1939>
These <WG3778> be<WG1526> they who separate<WG592> themselves,<WG1438> sensual,<WG5591> having<WG2192> not<WG3361> the Spirit.<WG4151>
But <WG1161> ye,<WG5210> beloved,<WG27> building up<WG2026> yourselves<WG1438> on your<WG5216> most holy<WG40> faith,<WG4102> praying<WG4336> in<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151>

Keep <WG5083> yourselves<WG1438> in<WG1722> the love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> looking for<WG4327> the<WG3588> mercy<WG1656> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> unto<WG1519> eternal<WG166> life.<WG2222>
And <WG2532> of some<WG3739> <WG3303> have compassion,<WG1653> making a difference: <WG1252>

And <WG1161> others<WG3739> save<WG4982> with<WG1722> fear,<WG5401> pulling<WG726> them out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> fire;<WG4442> hating<WG3404> even<WG2532> the<WG3588> garment<WG5509> spotted<WG4696> by<WG575> the<WG3588> flesh.<WG4561>

Now <WG1161> unto him that is able<WG1410> to keep<WG5442> you<WG5209> from falling,<WG679> and<WG2532> to present<WG2476> you faultless<WG299> before the presence<WG2714> of his<WG848> glory<WG1391> with<WG1722> exceeding joy,<WG20>

To the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Savior,<WG4990> be glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> majesty,<WG3172> dominion<WG2904> and<WG2532> power,<WG1849> both<WG2532> now<WG3568> and<WG2532> ever.<WG1519> <WG3956> <WG165> Amen.<WG281>
